00231 // Inlines
00232    
00233 inline bool 
00234 ItemIDTree::containsMap( uint32 mapID ) const
00235 {
00236    
00237    if ( mapID == MAX_UINT32 ) {
00238       // This is not a valid map id. No need to search for it.
00239       return false;
00240    }
00241    
00242    if ( m_byOverview.find( mapID ) != m_byOverview.end() ) {
00243       return true;
00244    }
00245    
00246    overviewKeyed_t::const_iterator it = m_byOverview.begin();
00247    while ( it != m_byOverview.end() ) {
00248       if ( it->second.first == mapID ) {
00249          return true;
00250       }
00251       ++it;
00252    }
00253    return false;
00254 }
